name: Avocado Pasta Sauce
description: This avocado pasta sauce is perfect when you're looking for a quick and easy dinner recipe. It's vegan, super delicious, and incredibly healthy!

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta according to the instructions on the package.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the pasta according to the instructions on the package.

recipeInstructions.text: In the meantime, combine all of the ingredients for the avocado sauce in a food processor or blender and process until smooth. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In the meantime, combine all of the ingredients for the avocado sauce in a food processor or blender and process until smooth. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Roast the pine nuts in a pan without oil. Be careful not to burn them as they burn rather quickly.
recipeInstructions.name: Roast the pine nuts in a pan without oil. Be careful not to burn them as they burn rather quickly.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the cherry tomatoes in halves and either roast them in the oven for a few minutes, cook them in a pan, or serve them fresh with the pasta.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the cherry tomatoes in halves and either roast them in the oven for a few minutes, cook them in a pan, or serve them fresh with the pasta.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the cooked pasta with the avocado sauce and carefully stir in the cherry tomatoes. Sprinkle with the roasted pine nuts and fresh basil. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Combine the cooked pasta with the avocado sauce and carefully stir in the cherry tomatoes. Sprinkle with the roasted pine nuts and fresh basil. Enjoy!

keywords: avocado pasta, avocado pasta sauce, avocado pesto pasta
